channel.title: So, what caused the down time this time?
channel.description: What caused the downtime this time? An attack? I thought someone has been banned, but that doesn't cause a downtime of at least [s]6 hours[/s] [b]4 days[/b].

item.title: So, what caused the down time this time?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

OK go Google for a DOS script and see if you can’t find one without malware. Or works correctly. I doubt you’ll find a ‘dos script’ on Google.

Read full topic

item.title: So, what caused the down time this time?
item.dc:creator: @Aaron2 Aaron;
item.description:
@Aaron2 wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:69, topic:201417”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=266078.msg2216066#msg2216066 date=1210198787]
Just leave moparscape alone if it annoys you so much. As you said, it’s best left running or they would all come over here.

I personally like having moparscape there for the times when MITB goes a bit quiet and I get bored.
[/quote]
I agree with you.
If it annoys you so much, why don’t you just leave it alone.
Trust me, if you remove it, you will get annoyed by all the moparscapers coming here.

@ Aaron,
Urban Dictionary says nothing special.
You can just submit anything you want to it, and someone on here just added ‘Moparscaper’ there.
It’s not like there are geniuses on the internet who added it.[/quote]

Good point, I started to hate Moparscape because the Fucking Idiots that spam WOT WER IS SILEB PLAZ HALP ME I WONT 2 FIND 2 PLAZ, Just ruins the Browsing the Pages, Rs2 Server Tutorials, etc, Moparscape Was good in late 2006-2007, I’m not going to lie, i Do go on there for sources and things to edit, But the People, God damn.

Read full topic

T X on the other hand, isn’t just a ‘moparscaper’ he’s very smart when it comes to hacking and such.

If it is him, then i doubt it’ll be stopped for a while.[/quote]cock is big. go back to moparscape. “he’s very smart”: i bet he is smart, with a name like that i could fuck him in the ass.

carson you’re the newfag who got caught by the cops for crashing cars, go back doing what you’re trying to be good at, you still suck.

item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:204307”]Just leave moparscape alone if it annoys you so much. As you said, it’s best left running or they would all come over here.

I personally like having moparscape there for the times when MITB goes a bit quiet and I get bored.[/quote]
I agree with you.
If it annoys you so much, why don’t you just leave it alone.
Trust me, if you remove it, you will get annoyed by all the moparscapers coming here.

@ Aaron,
Urban Dictionary says nothing special.
You can just submit anything you want to it, and someone on here just added ‘Moparscaper’ there.
It’s not like there are geniuses on the internet who added it.

item.source: So, what caused the down time this time?

item.title: So, what caused the down time this time?
item.dc:creator: @Aaron2 Aaron;
item.description:
@Aaron2 wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:63, topic:201417”]Moparscape should burn in hell.[/quote] I agree, alot of moparscapers just go to the site and Look for sources and call people “Leechers” heres an example from an urban dictionary The most common meaning of “moparscaper”:
Someone who fails at Java and/or is a COMPLETE idiot and can’t spell properly.

The other meaning:
Someone who registered on moparisthebest.com and hangs out there a lot.

Example 1:
i have a vary good laptop, and all java programs works, but when, i try and load Moparscape on my laptop. it doesnt work…!! plz, help me, i will rep++ ty!

Example 2:
Plz Check Out My Server! First 3 Gets AdminStatus And 100 Rep…! Next 5 Gets, ModStatus. PLZ TRY IT OUT!!!

Example 3:
Smart/Respected person: P1
Moparscaper: P2

P1 says: Shut up, P2, we didn’t ask for your idiotic opinion, you moron.
P2 says: xcept im not a moron cuz its only ur opnion!!!
P1 and other people say: GTFO
P2 says: make me!!1 ur jus hiding the truth cuz u suck!!!11!

P2 and other people then proceed to heavily flame P1 until the discussion is closed or P1 is banned/leaves.

Its fucking Sad, i just wish mscp could be closed, all we all stick to mitb, but then a riot of dicks would Fucking spam the shit out of this place.

Read full topic

item.title: So, what caused the down time this time?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:60, topic:201417”]Would be nice if I had those skills, because then I’d definitely know how to stop this.

He’s doing this for attention but then denying it…? Sorry, don’t understand the logic there…

Same here.

People on IRC are saying mopar discovered the attacker, that’s true?[/quote]

I saw something about that, yes. Someone in #sales was telling him about an msn convo he had with the guy attacking. The site is back up, so I assume Moparisthebest stopped him.

item.title: So, what caused the down time this time?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I agree. It really wasn’t.
[hr]

[quote=“nohope, post:47, topic:201417”]…[quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=266078.msg2206364#msg2206364 date=1209460472]
He was kidding dumb ass.
[/quote]
Yesterday you were standing up for them, now your calling them dumb asses?[/quote]

I get moody easily. Which leads to me flaming people. I don’t remember standing up for Chrisn2323, I might have. But when someone is being a dumb ass, I’m going to be honest.
[hr]

nohope:

Hmm, if you are not having your period then that is know way to act to a vet/Mpscp Mod. Why so tense? Unless their is something to be angry about don’t be swearing at other members.

As for this, I’ll act any way I fucking want to someone. Regardless of their status in the community. Quit the backseat moderating. No one fucking cares. I think MoparScape mods need the flame more than anyone. Who gives a shit if they’re a mod of MoparScape, they are just members of this community as everyone else. They obey the rules here, as do we. Their title might mean they can lock and pin topics on MoparScape, but all they can do here is report me.

Read full topic
